forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. Southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the sun blesses the city with a gentle warmth, illuminating the iconic skyline and casting glittering reflections upon the bay. With temperatures hovering near the low sixties, the air is refreshingly crisp, inviting a pleasant wander along the waterfront or a casual stroll through the verdant parks. The west-northwest breeze dances lightly through the streets, offering just enough of a chill to coax the layered look from an eager wardrobe. 

As evening approaches, the skies will remain mostly clear, with temperatures dipping into the mid-forties. This transition calls for a light jacket as the night delivers a cool embrace, and perhaps a walk along the Embarcadero would be a fitting way to enjoy the serene views of the moonlit waters. There’s no fog to obscure the horizon but a hint of the marine layer lingers—promising crisp, coastal air. With such clarity overhead, it seems a perfect time to sip on coffee at a sidewalk café, surrounded by the soft buzz of city life, while watching the sun slowly dip beyond the Golden Gate.
